title: Large-Scale Computer Science-Based Language Education Course Using Game Design Software

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts, familiarity with Unity 3D interface, and technical document reading/writing proficiency
context.additional_context: A course educating professionals in medical/legal/technical fields on effectively conveying complex computer science concepts within language domains (grammar, vocabulary, expression)

learning_goals: Learners enhance spatial reasoning and text-based command expression skills by creating and manipulating 3D game objects in a Unity 3D environment.
Learners apply object-oriented programming concepts and refine code documentation skills by implementing simple game mechanics using C# scripting.
Through the game design process, learners strengthen problem-solving and system design capabilities while cultivating the ability to articulate technical content clearly.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
